snippet.title: Space Otter Charlie - Otter Facts! | OUT NOW!
snippet.description:
Space Otter Charlie hits the Nintendo Switch, Xbox, PlayStation and Steam on March 18th 2021!

Head out into space to find a new home for Charlie and the whole animal kingdom! 

Charlie and his crew of otternauts need your help to find a planet suitable for all the animals left behind from humanity’s grand exodus. In Space Otter Charlie you’ll shoot, slide, and jetpack your way through all sorts of obstacles - but watch out for ARES! They’re the Anti Rodent Elimination System trying to keep you from scavenging all the parts you need. It’s not all mechanical menaces blocking your way, you’ll need to dodge debris, exposed wiring, and dangerous jets of flame to build up an arsenal worthy of your adventures. Lazors, Shark suits, and more are available with the help of your buddy Build Bot - so make sure you grab all the junk you can find!

Space Otter Charlie on Switch: https://www.qag.io/SOCSwitch
Space Otter Charlie on Xbox: https://www.qag.io/SOCXbox
Space Otter Charlie on PlayStation: https://www.qag.io/SOCPlayStation
Space Otter Charlie on Steam: https://www.qag.io/SOCSteam

Wayward Distractions Website: https://www.spaceottercharlie.com​
Wayward Distractions Twitter: https://twitter.com/SpaceOtterC​
Wayward Distractions Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/spaceotterch...​

Quantum Website: https://www.qag.io​
Quantum Twitter: https://twitter.com/QuantumApG​
Quantum Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/QuantumApG
